title: TEAM FORSBERG (Chris Forsberg, Alex Jagger, Bryan Heitkotter)
description:
We have the whole Forsberg Racing team! What's it take to go from amateur to sponsored driver? What can autocross, sim racing, or rally do for your driving? How long can a GT-R engine last? All these questions and more get answered on this episode, because we have all the drivers of Forsberg racing! 

3-time Formula Drift champion, Chris Forsberg @chrisforsberg64 , has expanded his team to include some up-and-comers: 

Alex Jagger is competing in Formula Drift Pro Spec, the tier just below FD Pro. He's won multiple Rally America National Championship stages and began drifting in 2014. @jagger277 

Representing the grip side of things, Bryan Heitkotter is proof that sim racing can get you a ride in real cars. In 2011, he became the first winner of the Nissan U.S.A GT Academy talent search. He's also an SCCA National Autocross champ, and placed 3rd in the Dubai 24 Hours. @bryanheitkotter 

We're going to hear the stories of how they came up the ranks and why Chris chose them. 

https://forsbergracing.com/team-1 

 

Buy Innova tools at all major automotive retailers, Amazon and https://www.Innova.com to find the problem AND fix the problem. 

Go to https://www.blackvue.com/TST and use the promo code TIRE to get 10% off of any BlackVue dashcam. Free shipping for orders over $200. 

Go to http://sheathunderwear.com and get the most comfortable underwear you’ll ever wear. If you use the promo code TIRE20, you’ll also get twenty percent off your order. 

 

Want to watch the live stream, get ad-free podcasts, or exclusive podcasts? Join our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (alex jagger, bryan heitkotter, chris forsberg)
